00033 #define ZGP_NVM_TABLE_VERSION 0x1u
00034 #define ZGP_GROUP_CAST_RADIUS_DEFAULT            0x00
00035 
00036 #define ZGP_SEC_FRAME_COUNTER_DEFAULT            0xFFFFFFFF
00037 
00038 #ifndef ZGP_SINK_GROUP_LIST_SIZE
00039 #define ZGP_SINK_GROUP_LIST_SIZE 2
00040 #endif
00041 
00042 #ifndef ZGP_LIGHT_WEIGHT_SINK_ADDRESS_LIST_SIZE
00043 #define ZGP_LIGHT_WEIGHT_SINK_ADDRESS_LIST_SIZE 2
00044 #endif

00048 #endif

00050 #define ZGP_NWK_ADDRESS_GROUP_INIT               0xFFFF
00051 #define ZGP_ENTRY_INVALID_INDEX   0xFF
00052 
00053 // Checks and configures ZGP proxy table. Minimum size should be 5.
00054 #ifdef  ZGP_PROXY_TABLE_SIZE
00055 #if (ZGP_PROXY_TABLE_SIZE < 5)
00056 #warning Proxy table size shall be minimum 5as per section A.3.4.2.1 in green power spec
00057 #endif //(ZGP_PROXY_TABLE_SIZE < 5)
00058 #else
00059 #define ZGP_PROXY_TABLE_SIZE    5
00060 #endif //ZGP_PROXY_TABLE_SIZE
00061 
00062 // Checks and configures ZGP sink table. Minimum size should be 5.
00063 #if APP_ZGP_DEVICE_TYPE == APP_ZGP_DEVICE_TYPE_COMBO_BASIC
00064 #ifdef  ZGP_SINK_TABLE_SIZE
00065 #if (ZGP_SINK_TABLE_SIZE < 5)
00066 #warning Sink table size shall be minimum 5 as per section A.3.3.2.1 in green power spec
00067 #endif //(ZGP_SINK_TABLE_SIZE < 5)
00068 #else
00069 #define ZGP_SINK_TABLE_SIZE    5
00070 #endif // ZGP_SINK_TABLE_SIZE
00071 #endif //APP_ZGP_DEVICE_TYPE == APP_ZGP_DEVICE_TYPE_COMBO_BASIC

00076 typedef enum _ZgpTableType_t
00077 {
00078   ZGP_PROXY_TABLE = 0x0,
00079   ZGP_SINK_TABLE = 0x1,
00080   ZGP_UNINIT_TABLE_TYPE = 0x3
00081 } ZGP_TableType_t;

00083 BEGIN_PACK
00084 typedef enum _ZgpReadOperationStatus_t
00085 {
00086   ENTRY_NOT_AVAILABLE = 0x0,
00087   ACTIVE_ENTRY_AVAILABLE = 0x1,
00088 } ZGP_ReadOperationStatus_t;
00089 
00090 typedef enum _ZpTableUpdateAction_t
00091 {
00092   UPDATE_ENTRY = 0x1,
00093   REPLACE_ENTRY = 0x2,
00094   REMOVE_PAIRING_ENTRY = 0x3
00095 } ZGP_TableUpdateAction_t;
00096 
00097 typedef struct PACK _ZGP_SinkGroup_t
00098 {
00099   uint16_t sinkGroup;
00100   uint16_t alias;
00101 }ZGP_SinkGroup_t;
00102 
00103 typedef struct PACK _ZgpSecurityOptions_t
00104 {
00105   uint8_t securityLevel   :2;
00106   uint8_t securityKeyType :3;
00107   uint8_t reserved        :3;
00108 }zgpSecurityOptions_t;
00109 
00110 // GP pairing command
00111 typedef enum PACK _zgpCommunicationMode_t
00112 {
00113   FULL_UNICAST = 0x00,
00114   DERIVED_GROUPCAST = 0x01,
00115   PRECOMMISSIONED_GROUPCAST = 0x02,
00116   LIGHTWEIGHT_UNICAST = 0x03,
00117   ALL_COMMUNICATION_MODE = 0x04
00118 } zgpCommunicationMode_t;
00119 
00120 typedef struct _ZGP_TableOperationField_t
00121 {
00122   uint8_t appId;
00123   uint8_t tableType;
00124   uint8_t commMode;
00125   uint8_t nonEmptyIndexForRead;
00126 } ZGP_TableOperationField_t;
00127 
00128 typedef struct PACK _ZgpProxyTableEntryOptions_t
00129 {
00130   uint16_t appId                 :3;
00131   uint16_t entryActive           :1;
00132   uint16_t entryValid            :1;
00133   uint16_t macSeqNumCapability   :1;
00134   uint16_t lightWeightUnicastGps :1;
00135   uint16_t derivedGroupGps       :1;
00136   uint16_t commissionedGroupGps  :1;
00137   uint16_t firstToFoward         :1;
00138   uint16_t inRange               :1;
00139   uint16_t gpdFixed              :1;
00140   uint16_t hasAllUnicastRoutes   :1;
00141   uint16_t assignedAlias         :1;
00142   uint16_t securityUse           :1;
00143   uint16_t optionsExt            :1;
00144 }zgpProxyTableEntryOptions_t;
00145 
00146 typedef struct PACK _ZgpTableGenericInfo_t
00147 {
00148  //ID of the GPD
00149   ZGP_GpdId_t gpdId;
00150   //The security key for the GPD
00151   uint8_t securityKey[16];
00152   //The incoming security frame counter for the GPD
00153   uint32_t gpdSecurityFrameCounter;
00154   //GroupIDs and Aliases for the sinks that require the tunneling in groupcast communication mode
00155   ZGP_SinkGroup_t zgpSinkGrouplist[ZGP_SINK_GROUP_LIST_SIZE];
00156   //The commissioned 16-bit ID to be used as alias for this GPD
00157   uint16_t gpdAssignedAlias;
00158 
00159   //GPD endpoint
00160   uint8_t endPoint;
00161   //To limit the range of the group-cast
00162   uint8_t groupCastRadius;
00163   //The security options
00164   zgpSecurityOptions_t securityOptions;
00165 } zgpTableGenericInfo_t;
00166 
00167 typedef struct PACK _ZgpProxyLightWeightSinkAddr_t
00168 {
00169   uint64_t sinkIeeeAddr;
00170   uint16_t sinkNwkAddr;
00171 }zgpProxyLightWeightSinkAddr_t;
00172 
00173 typedef struct PACK _ZgpExtendedOptions_t
00174 {
00175   uint16_t fullUnicastGPS  :1;
00176   uint16_t reserved        :15;
00177 }zgpExtendedOptions_t;
00178 
00179 typedef struct PACK _ZGP_ProxyTableEntry_t
00180 {
00181   //IEEE and short address of the sink(s) that requires tunneling in lightweight unicast communica-tion mode
00182   zgpProxyLightWeightSinkAddr_t zgpProxyLightWeightSinkAddrlist[ZGP_LIGHT_WEIGHT_SINK_ADDRESS_LIST_SIZE];
00183   // entry options
00184   zgpProxyTableEntryOptions_t options;
00185 #if ZGP_PROXY_ADVANCED == 1
00186   //IEEE and short address of the sink(s) that requires tunneling in full unicast communication mode
00187   zgpProxyLightWeightSinkAddr_t zgpProxyFullUnicastSinkAddrlist[ZGP_FULL_UNICAST_SINK_ADDRESS_LIST_SIZE];
00188   //This parameter specifies exten-sions to the tunneling options
00189   zgpExtendedOptions_t extendedOptions;
00190   //For inactive/invalid entries, allows for Sink re-discovery when Search Counter equals 0
00191   uint8_t searchCounter;
00192 #endif
00193   // Generic info - common to sink and proxy table
00194   zgpTableGenericInfo_t tableGenericInfo;
00195 } ZGP_ProxyTableEntry_t;
00196 
00197 //Describes whether a particular field is present in sinkTableEntry
00198 typedef struct PACK _ZgpSinkTableEntryOptions_t
00199 {
00200   uint16_t appId                 :3;
00201   // This is mainly used in OTA sink entry format
00202   // This will be derived from commModeMask in ZGP_SinkTableEntry_t
00203   // while sending OTA
00204   uint16_t communicationMode     :2;
00205   uint16_t seqNumCapabilities    :1;
00206   uint16_t rxOnCapability        :1;
00207   uint16_t fixedLocation         :1;
00208   uint16_t assignedAlias         :1;
00209   uint16_t securityUse           :1;
00210   uint16_t reserved              :6;
00211 }zgpSinkTableEntryOptions_t;
00212 
00213 typedef struct PACK _ZGP_SinkTableEntry_t
00214 {
00215   // Generic info - common to sink and proxy table
00216   zgpTableGenericInfo_t tableGenericInfo;
00217   // entry options
00218   zgpSinkTableEntryOptions_t options;
00219   // comm mode mask
00220   // FULL_UNICAST ->              (1 << 0x00)
00221   // DERIVED_GROUPCAST ->         (1 << 0x01)
00222   // PRECOMMISSIONED_GROUPCAST -> (1 << 0x02)
00223   // LIGHTWEIGHT_UNICAST ->       (1 << 0x03)
00224   uint8_t commModeMask;
00225   uint8_t deviceId;
00226 } ZGP_SinkTableEntry_t;
00227 END_PACK
